mainText:
In 1984 I was a senior in high school and my father brought home a 128k 
Mac. I could use a computer. I've been using Steve's products for the 
last  27 years. Each and every one of them changed how I looked at 
things. I always describe to friends my feelings about Apple's products 
that using them is fun. Using PC's was working, using Macs was like 
playing they were just fun. Steve Jobs changed my profession, he made it 
easier. That's what he has always done. Thank you Mr. Jobs. You have 
enriched my life and that of my family.
author: Chuck
